- Encryption with a password and irrecoverable with a duplicate password. User friendly GUI.

System Requirement                                                                                               
Operating System: Windows 10

Working method: Click on to ‘Select File’. Select the file you wish to encrypt or decrypt. Set the password next to ‘Password’. Click on ‘Safe Encryption’ or ‘Safe Decryption’. While processing it prompts the exact percentage and completion status. After completion you can see the encrypted file with ‘.safe’ extension added with same name or in decryption the original file. Note that in decryption, you should give the correct password that you given in encryption matters.
